trends: There have been 97 other sightings in Miami
There were 2 other sightings in Miami on or around April 3rd 2010
Summary: This is of an abduction event where I saw a dinosaur like (allosaurus) alien entity.
divs: Sighting DetailsI left a neighbors house and right outside was a car waiting for me. I got into the vehicle and was driven close to my house near a bridge. There I was drugged and tortured with sound weapons of a non lethal variety by secret government agents. Then after that I saw out of an apature in space walk through a brown skinned dinosaur like entity. It smelled me and it was terrifying.
